info.title: NotificationHubs RP Client
info.description: Microsoft Notification Hubs Resource Provider REST API.

get.description: List the operations for the provider

post.summary: Checks the availability of the given service namespace across all Azure subscriptions. This is useful because the domain name is created based on the service namespace name.
post.description: Checks the availability of the given service namespace across all Azure subscriptions. This is useful because the domain name is created based on the service namespace name.

get.description: Lists all the available namespaces within the subscription.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.

get.description: Lists the available namespaces within a resource group.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.

put.description: Creates / Updates a Notification Hub namespace. This operation is idempotent.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: A link to the status monitor

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

delete.description: Deletes an existing namespace. This operation also removes all associated notificationHubs under the namespace.

get.description: Gets the authorization rules for a namespace.
Gets an authorization rule for a namespace by name.

put.description: Creates an authorization rule for a namespace

post.description: Gets the Primary and Secondary ConnectionStrings to the namespace.
Regenerates the Primary/Secondary Keys to the Namespace Authorization Rule
Checks the availability of the given notificationHub in a namespace.

get.description: Lists the notification hubs associated with a namespace.

put.description: Creates/Update a NotificationHub in a namespace.

patch.description: Patch a NotificationHub in a namespace.

delete.description: Deletes a notification hub associated with a namespace.

get.description: Gets the authorization rules for a NotificationHub.
Gets an authorization rule for a NotificationHub by name.

put.description: Creates/Updates an authorization rule for a NotificationHub

post.description: Gets the Primary and Secondary ConnectionStrings to the NotificationHub
Regenerates the Primary/Secondary Keys to the NotificationHub Authorization Rule
Lists the PNS Credentials associated with a notification hub.
Lists the PNS credentials associated with a namespace.

get.description:
Returns all Private Endpoint Connections that belong to the given Notification Hubs namespace.
This is a public API that can be called directly by Notification Hubs users.

Returns a Private Endpoint Connection with a given name.
This is a public API that can be called directly by Notification Hubs users.

put.description:
Approves or rejects Private Endpoint Connection.
This is a public API that can be called directly by Notification Hubs users.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Description of the Private Endpoint Connection resource.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: A link to the status monitor

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

delete.description:
Deletes the Private Endpoint Connection.
This is a public API that can be called directly by Notification Hubs users.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

get.description:
Even though this namespace requires subscription id, resource group and namespace name, it returns a constant payload (for a given namespacE) every time it's called.
That's why we don't send it to the sibling RP, but process it directly in the scale unit that received the request.

Even though this namespace requires subscription id, resource group and namespace name, it returns a constant payload (for a given namespacE) every time it's called.
That's why we don't send it to the sibling RP, but process it directly in the scale unit that received the request.

parameters.name: subResourceName
parameters.description: Name of the Private Link sub-resource. The only supported sub-resource is "namespace"

clientId.description: Gets or sets the client identifier.

clientSecret.description: Gets or sets the credential secret access key.

authTokenUrl.description: Gets or sets the URL of the authorization token.

apnsCertificate.description: Gets or sets the APNS certificate.

certificateKey.description: Gets or sets the certificate key.

endpoint.description: Gets or sets the endpoint of this credential.

thumbprint.description: Gets or sets the APNS certificate Thumbprint

keyId.description:
Gets or sets a 10-character key identifier (kid) key, obtained from
your developer account

appName.description: Gets or sets the name of the application

appId.description:
Gets or sets the issuer (iss) registered claim key, whose value is
your 10-character Team ID, obtained from your developer account

token.description:
Gets or sets provider Authentication Token, obtained through your
developer account

Availability.description: Represents metric availability (part of RP operation descriptions).

baiduApiKey.description: Gets or sets baidu Api Key.

baiduSecretKey.description: Gets or sets baidu Secret Key

subject.description: Gets or sets web push subject.

vapidPrivateKey.description: Gets or sets VAPID private key.

vapidPublicKey.description: Gets or sets VAPID public key.

CheckAvailabilityParameters.description:
Parameters supplied to the Check Name Availability for Namespace and
NotificationHubs.

isAvailiable.description: Not used and deprecated since API version 2023-01-01-preview

sku.description: The Sku description for a namespace

isAvailiable.description:
Gets or sets true if the name is available and can be used to
create new Namespace/NotificationHub. Otherwise false.

sku.description: The Sku description for a namespace

results.description: Gets or sets actual failure description

gcmEndpoint.description: Gets or sets the GCM endpoint.

googleApiKey.description: Gets or sets the Google API key.

IpRule.description: A network authorization rule that filters traffic based on IP address.

displayName.description: Display name of the log category.

blobDuration.description: Duration of data written to a single blob.

categoryGroups.description: Category group for the log specification.

aggregationType.description: Type of the aggregation (Average, Minimum, Maximum, Total or Count).

supportedTimeGrainTypes.description: List of supported time grain types.

metricFilterPattern.description: The matching regex pattern to be applied to the field pointed by the "metricsFilterPathSelector" flag in the ARM manifest.

fillGapWithZero.description: Optional property. If set to true, then zero will be returned for time duration where no metric is emitted / published.

mpnsCertificate.description: Gets or sets the MPNS certificate.

certificateKey.description: Gets or sets the certificate key for this credential.

thumbprint.description: Gets or sets the MPNS certificate Thumbprint

value.description: The NamespaceResource items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

sku.description: The Sku description for a namespace

name.description:
Name of the Notification Hubs namespace. This is immutable property, set automatically
by the service when the namespace is created.

enabled.description: Gets or sets whether or not the namespace is currently enabled.

critical.description: Gets or sets whether or not the namespace is set as Critical.

region.description:
Region. The value is always set to the same value as Namespace.Location, so we are deprecating
this property.

createdAt.description: Time when the namespace was created.

updatedAt.description: Time when the namespace was updated.

networkAcls.description: A collection of network authorization rules.

pnsCredentials.description: Collection of Notification Hub or Notification Hub Namespace PNS credentials.

serviceBusEndpoint.description:
Gets or sets endpoint you can use to perform NotificationHub
operations.

scaleUnit.description: Gets or sets scaleUnit where the namespace gets created

sku.description: The Sku description for a namespace

NetworkAcls.description: A collection of network authorization rules.

publicNetworkRule.description: A default (public Internet) network authorization rule, which contains rights if no other network rule matches.

value.description: The NotificationHubResource items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

sku.description: The Sku description for a namespace

name.description: Gets or sets the NotificationHub name.

registrationTtl.description: Gets or sets the RegistrationTtl of the created NotificationHub

authorizationRules.description: Gets or sets the AuthorizationRules of the created NotificationHub

sku.description: The Sku description for a namespace

Operation.description: Result of the request to list SQL operations.

name.description: The name of the operation being performed on this particular object."

display.description: he localized display information for this particular operation / action.

isDataAction.description: The intended executor of the operation."

provider.description: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name, e.g. "Microsoft Monitoring Insights" or "Microsoft Compute".

resource.description: The localized friendly name of the resource type related to this operation. E.g. "Virtual Machines" or "Job Schedule Collections".

operation.description: The concise, localized friendly name for the operation; suitable for dropdowns. E.g. "Create or Update Virtual Machine", "Restart Virtual Machine".

description.description: The short, localized friendly description of the operation; suitable for tool tips and detailed views.

value.description: The Operation items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

serviceSpecification.description: Optional service specification used in Operations API.

PnsCredentials.description: Collection of Notification Hub or Notification Hub Namespace PNS credentials.

PnsCredentialsResource.description:
Description of a NotificationHub PNS Credentials. This is a response of the POST requests that return namespace or hubs
PNS credentials.

properties.description: Collection of Notification Hub or Notification Hub Namespace PNS credentials.

policyKey.description: Type of Shared Access Policy Key (primary or secondary).

PolicyKeyType.description: Type of Shared Access Policy Key (primary or secondary).

privateEndpoint.description: Represents a Private Endpoint that is connected to Notification Hubs namespace using Private Endpoint Connection.

groupIds.description: List of group ids. For Notification Hubs, it always contains a single "namespace" element.

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: State of the Private Link Service connection.

PrivateEndpointConnectionResource.description: Represents a Private Endpoint Connection ARM resource - a sub-resource of Notification Hubs namespace.

PrivateEndpointConnectionResourceListRes.description: The response of a PrivateEndpointConnectionResource list operation.

value.description: The PrivateEndpointConnectionResource items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

properties.description: Represents properties of Private Link Resource.

PrivateLinkResourceListResult.description: The response of a PrivateLinkResource list operation.

value.description: The PrivateLinkResource items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

PrivateLinkResourceProperties.description: Represents properties of Private Link Resource.

groupId.description: A Group Id for Private Link. For Notification Hubs, it is always set to "namespace".

requiredMembers.description: Required members. For Notification Hubs, it's always a collection with a single "namespace" item.

requiredZoneNames.description: Required DNS zone names. For Notification Hubs, it contains two CNames for Service Bus and Notification Hubs zones.

PublicInternetAuthorizationRule.description: A default (public Internet) network authorization rule, which contains rights if no other network rule matches.

RegistrationResult.description: Notification result for a single registration.

RemotePrivateEndpointConnection.description: Represents a Private Endpoint that is connected to Notification Hubs namespace using Private Endpoint Connection.

id.description: ARM resource ID of the Private Endpoint. This may belong to different subscription and resource group than a Notification Hubs namespace.

RemotePrivateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: State of the Private Link Service connection.

ResourceListKeys.description: Response for the POST request that returns Namespace or NotificationHub access keys (connection strings).

primaryConnectionString.description: Gets or sets primaryConnectionString of the AuthorizationRule.

secondaryConnectionString.description:
Gets or sets secondaryConnectionString of the created
AuthorizationRule

primaryKey.description: Gets or sets primaryKey of the created AuthorizationRule.

secondaryKey.description: Gets or sets secondaryKey of the created AuthorizationRule

keyName.description: Gets or sets keyName of the created AuthorizationRule

ServiceSpecification.description: Optional service specification used in Operations API.

value.description: The SharedAccessAuthorizationRuleResource items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

rights.description: Gets or sets the rights associated with the rule.

primaryKey.description:
Gets a base64-encoded 256-bit primary key for signing and
validating the SAS token.

secondaryKey.description:
Gets a base64-encoded 256-bit primary key for signing and
validating the SAS token.

keyName.description: Gets a string that describes the authorization rule.

modifiedTime.description: Gets the last modified time for this rule

createdTime.description: Gets the created time for this rule

claimType.description: Gets a string that describes the claim type

claimValue.description: Gets a string that describes the claim value

revision.description: Gets the revision number for the rule

SharedAccessAuthorizationRuleResource.description: Response for POST requests that return single SharedAccessAuthorizationRule.

Sku.description: The Sku description for a namespace

tier.description: Gets or sets the tier of particular sku

size.description: Gets or sets the Sku size

family.description: Gets or sets the Sku Family

capacity.description: Gets or sets the capacity of the resource

packageSid.description: Gets or sets the package ID for this credential.

secretKey.description: Gets or sets the secret key.

windowsLiveEndpoint.description: Gets or sets the Windows Live endpoint.

certificateKey.description: Ges or sets the WNS Certificate Key.

wnsCertificate.description: Gets or sets the WNS Certificate.

endpoint.description: Gets or sets xiaomi service endpoint.
